Add the revealed card to your hand. If the revealed card's CP cost is an odd number, deal the chosen Forward 4000 damage, dull it and Freeze it. Add the revealed card to your hand.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: When Chaos (MOBIUS) enters the field, if the cost paid to play Chaos (MOBIUS) included Fire CP, deal 5000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.
